name: Verona Beach dashboard theme
description: A dashboard theme made specifically for Verona Beach RPG, featuring Sasha Banks.

user.name: letsgetexplicit
user.about:
Hey all! Just a film student who loves to tinker with designs and logos! I do mostly Tumblr stuff but I'm open to try new things! If you'd like to request something, shoot me an ask at http://letsgetexplicit.tumblr.com and I'll get to it as soon as I can!

Happy blogging!
